alert.note: Alert for Greene; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 1:55PM CDT until August 29 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 155 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near southeast Springfield, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eastern Springfield... Rogersville... Fordland... Galloway... Turners... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
